about_the_game:
Soul Split is a PSX styled action rogue-lite dungeon crawler following an amnesiac sorcerer who’s previous actions broke the cycle of life and death. Conscripted into the service of Death itself, you’ll delve into a vast dungeon overflowing with magic and monsters to “clean up your mess.”

Build an Arsenal of Chaos


Scavenge for materials around the world to craft a powerful arsenal of spells. Collect lost tomes dropped by enemies and bosses to add their move sets to your own. With eight different elements covering every imaginable category of magic, there are countless ways to burn your path through these twisted lands.

Haunted By Your Past


Afflicted with a strange curse, your soul persists beyond death and becomes torn between dimensions when lethal damage is taken. Stuck in a dark mirror of the waking world with a ghost of your past self wandering the dungeon, you must reach your point of death in order to mend your soul. Failure here means restarting your run entirely, and with horrifying otherworldly beasts drawn to your every step, failure is all but certain.

Explore a Deathless World


Delve deep into a subterranean world that has been warped and twisted by its many powerful inhabitants. Venture into the domains of higher beings and uncover their secrets. Discover a greater narrative through notes left by the residents of these ruined kingdoms detailing the rich history of the world. Befriend a cast of strange creatures and odd characters each with a unique story of their own.

On Behalf of The Reaper


Returned from the afterlife with little memory of your past you're immediately Inducted into the service of The Reaper to serve as one of their agents. your task is to investigate a catastrophic curse of undeath that's befallen the land. Traverse the subterranean ruins of forgotten kingdoms and find out what is keeping The Reaper out, all while uncovering mysteries of the world and your past in the process.

Features


  • Explosive, fast paced, and chaotic combat
  • An in-depth story adapted to the roguelike format
  • Explore a mysterious subterranean world brimming with a diverse cast of horrific foes
  • Several Intense and viscous boss fights
  • A sandbox of over 100 spells split between 8 core elements
  • A wide variety of strange and charming characters
  • A second chance mechanic in the form of a ghost of your past life
  • An intuitive spell crafting system
  • An old school PSX aesthetic with a modern flourish
  • An epic greater narrative told in fragments found throughout the world

short_description: Soul Split is a top-down, spell-slinging, action rogue-lite about an amnesiac sorcerer who's usurped the power of Death itself. Burn your way to the heart of an ever shifting dungeon, discovering powerful spells, slaying strange creatures, and uncovering the secrets of a deathless world.
